cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noseru

sentence.kanji: 皿にケーキを載せました。
sentence.english: I put the cake on the plate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heru

sentence.kanji: 体重がかなり減りました。
sentence.english: I've lost a lot of weight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's herasu

sentence.kanji: 最近、食事を減らしています。

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansei

sentence.kanji: 新しいホームページが完成した。
sentence.english: We finished our new home page.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asai
Remember this word you see, it's genshou

sentence.kanji: この国は人口が減少しているわね。
sentence.romaji: kono kuni ha jinkou ga genshou shite iru wa ne
sentence.english: The population of this country is decreasing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokoromiru

sentence.kanji: 彼は実験を試みたのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jiken wo kokoromita no yo

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tamesu

sentence.kanji: 彼はそのソフトウェアを試したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono sofutouea wo tameshita no

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiai

sentence.kanji: 試合の結果を早く知りたい。
sentence.romaji: shiai no keka wo hayaku shiritai
sentence.english: I want to know soon the results of the game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiki

sentence.kanji: 彼らは教会で式を挙げました。
sentence.romaji: karera ha kyoukai de shiki wo agemashita
sentence.english: They had a wedding ceremony in the church.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gousei

sentence.kanji: このソフトで画像を合成できます。
sentence.romaji: kono sofuto de gazou wo gousei dekimasu
sentence.english: Images can be synthesized with this software.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noru

sentence.kanji: 先生の論文が雑誌に載りましたよ。
sentence.romaji: sensei no ronbun ga zashi ni norimashita yo
sentence.english: Our professor's paper was published in the journal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakugen

sentence.kanji: 福祉予算は削減されないことに決まったのよ。
sentence.romaji: fukushiyosan ha sakugen sarenai koto ni kimata no yo
sentence.english: They decided not to reduce the social welfare budget.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabushiki

sentence.kanji: 彼は株式の売買で多額の利益を得たのさ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kabushiki no baibai de tagaku no rieki wo eta no sa
sentence.english: He gained a large profit through buying and selling stocks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tameshi

sentence.kanji: 試しにこの曲を弾いてみてください。
sentence.romaji: tameshi ni kono kyoku wo hiite mite kudasai
sentence.english: Try playing this tune, by way of experiment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's horobiru

sentence.kanji: その文明は何千年も前に滅びてしまったの。
sentence.romaji: sono bunmei ha nanzennen mo mae ni horobite shimata no
sentence.english: That civilization was destroyed thousands of years ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's makotoni

sentence.kanji: 誠にありがとうございます。

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiro

sentence.kanji: 今回の旅行ではヨーロッパの城を見て回ります。
sentence.romaji: konkai no ryokou de ha yo-ropa no shiro wo mite mawarimasu
sentence.english: I will look around some European castles on this trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinsen

sentence.kanji: 金銭のトラブルには関わりたくありません。
sentence.romaji: kinsen no toraburu ni ha kakawaritaku arimasen
sentence.english: I don't want to get involved with money problems.
